org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.jcr.type

Interface JcrTypeHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JcrDocumentTypeHandler, JcrFolderTypeHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJcrTypeHandler, DefaultDocumentTypeHandler, DefaultFolderTypeHandler, DefaultUnversionedDocumentTypeHandler

    public interface JcrTypeHandler
    Provides operations for a specific CMIS object type.
    See Also:
    JcrTypeHandlerManager
